name: LD47 - Runaway Train
description:
Created for Ludum Dare 47 - Stuck in a Loop.

A train suffers a system crash while you are onboard. Bring the systems back online to stop the train looping.

This entry is entered as unfinished, it's missing animations, music, etc and only contains 1 puzzle.

Keyboard and mouse

Movement WASD
Interact - Left Mouse Button
Cancel Interaction - Right Mouse Button

Created using Unity, Blender, Reaper, Inkscape and ttsMP3.com for train voices.
